title: Sunset
lyrics:
[Chorus]
(Sunset, sunset)
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, woah, it's sunset
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, woah, it's sunset
(Sunset, sunset)
[Verse 1]
You went and left me
Here all alone, yeah
You turned and walked away
About this time of day
[Chorus]
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, woah
(Sunset, sunset) At sunset
Woah
[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah
[Verse 2]
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, woah, I didn't want you to see me cry, yeah
(Sunset, sunset) So I just turned my head to hide the tears in my eye, yeah
When evening shadows fall
That's when I miss you most of all

[Chorus]
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, woah
(Sunset, sunset) At sunset
(Sunset, sunset) Woah
(Sunset, sunset) Woah, at sunset
